summary: A wrongdoer is caught red-handed and he is not going to forgive the man who exposed him.
cast: Arjun Sarja|Arvind Swamy|Gautham Karthik|Thulasi Nair|Lakshmi Manchu|Ponvannan|Singampuli|Kalairani|Guru Somasundaram|Vinodhini Vaidynathan|Baby Rakshana|Saran Shakthi|Eka Lakhani|Munishkanth|Melvin M. Ranjan
title: Kadal
